Follow-up EELS test release to the latest `bal-devnet-2` specs! These are updated to run in hive today: https://hive.ethpandaops.io/#/group/

For context on hive:
- `bal-quick` are all the BAL specific tests plus the 4 EIPs in devnet-2 (please prio passing these)
- `bal` is the latter plus every test we have filled for Amsterdam.
